title: Alternative to Berthold Caslon
content:
Hi all!

Just a quick question. I have been using Berthold Caslon for a personal web project. But since my switch to a mac. I do not have a mac compatible version of the font (only in .pfb & .pfm). I am wondering which other cut of Caslon is most similar to the Berthold version?

Thanks in Advance!

Eric.
